mainSequence.step: Merchant creates Payment Request using Payment Request API
Merchant calls HasEnrolledInstruments to check SRC Payment Methods support
Browser initiates CanMakePayment check for installed SRC Common Payment Handler
SRC Common Payment Handler verifies Long-lived Token in Indexed DB
Merchant launches Payment Request flow using Show
Browser initiates CanMakePayment check for SRC Common Payment Handler eligibility
SRC Common Payment Handler allows Payment Request execution
Browser invokes SRC Common Payment Handler
SRC Common Payment Handler opens Window with Payment Handler Page URL
Payment Handler Page requests SRCI Web App
SRC Common Payment Handler sends data to SRCI Web App
SRCI handles checkout process and returns result to SRC Common Payment Handler
SRC Common Payment Handler sends result data back to Merchant
Merchant confirms checkout completion to Consumer
